item.title: Trump blocked from firing Fed Governor Lisa Cook as lawsuit plays out
item.description: The Supreme Court is likely to have the final say on whether President Donald Trump has legal cause to remove Lisa Cook from the Federal Reserve.

item.title: Labor Dept. internal watchdog launches probe of BLS data collection
item.description: President Donald Trump recently fired BLS Commissioner Erika McEntarfer in response to a weak monthly jobs report.

item.title: Trump Fed nominee Stephen Miran advanced by Senate Banking committee, tees up final vote
item.description: Stephen Miran was nominated by President Donald Trump to fill the seat left open by former Fed governor Adriana Kugler's surprise resignation.

item.title: Poland shoots down Russian drones as Ukraine warns Putin is ‘testing the West’
item.description: The incident marks the first time the NATO member has directly engaged Russian assets in its airspace since Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

item.title: Sen. Cruz introduces bill to reduce regulatory burden facing AI companies
item.description: A proposal from Sen. Ted Cruz would allow AI companies to work with federal agencies to modify or waive regulations and speed up approval for AI softw...
